error.name: ItSeemsThatNodeAccidentallyBlewUpException
error.message:
An error happened and petpet doesn't have an error message for it! You probably found a bug. If you're not sure how to fix this, please report this error to %s, along with a description of what you were doing.

%s

corrupted-file.name: SomethingWeirdHappenedToYourGameFileException
corrupted-file.message: Your petpet game file appears to be corrupted. Please delete %s and try again.

write-file-error.name: YourDataFileIsRefusingToBeWrittenException
write-file-error.message: I can't write to your game file for some reason! Please take a look at %s and try again.

update-available.name: OhLookThereIsANewVersionYouCanPlayException
update-available.message:
You're currently playing petpet version %s, but version %s is available!
If you installed petpet and npm normally, you can update by running %s.
Alternatively, just run this command again to keep playing!
You won't get this error again until you decide to update.

undefined.name: ThereWasAnErrorButWeHaveNoIdeaWhatItWasException
undefined.message:
Something caused petpet to run its error handling code, but didn't actually say what was wrong. This is probably a really serious bug! If you're not sure how to fix this yourself, please report this error to %s, with a description of what you were doing.

%s
